extension.name: mod_twitter
extension.author: Ryan Priebe
extension.description: Display a list of tweets from your Twitter account.

field.name: screen_name
field.label: Screen Name
field.description: The Twitter account whose tweets you would like to display.

field.name: follow_us_link_text
field.label: Follow us text
field.description: If you've chosen to display the follow us link, set what you want that link to say here.

field.name: display_type
field.label: Tweet source
field.description: Username will load all the user's latest tweets. Hashtags will use the list of hashtags you provide to build the list of tweets.

field.name: hashtags
field.label: Hashtags
field.description: The hashtags you want to use to build the list of tweets, comma separated.

field.name: show_follow_us_link
field.label: Display follow us link
field.description: Show or hide the follow us link.

field.name: show_user
field.label: Display the tweeter's name
field.description: Show or hide the username of the user who posted each tweet.

field.name: show_postdate
field.label: Display the post date
field.description: Show or hide the date each tweet was posted.
